home.description: IT professional specialized in various roles and tools. In recent years, I have focused my development on Front End Development, complementing my independent professional activity with teaching JavaScript and Python. I combine technical skills with management and administration experience.

about.title: Technologies
about.description: This portfolio was built using modern technologies and web development best practices. Below are the main components and tools used in its development.

technologies.react: JavaScript library for building interactive and dynamic user interfaces.
technologies.chakra: Modular and accessible design system that provides reusable React components.
technologies.framer: Animation library for creating smooth and interactive motions.
technologies.i18next: Internationalization framework that enables complete site translation.
technologies.emailjs: Service that allows sending emails directly from the frontend without a backend.
technologies.github: Version control and collaboration platform for code development.
